product_name: Icebreaker Everyday Long Underwear Leggings - Men's
long_description: A light first layer for any activity, the men's Icebreaker Everyday long underwear leggings keep you comfortable in cool weather thanks to naturally insulating lightweight merino wool. Merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly, breathes to regulate temperature and resists odors naturally. Fabric offers UPF 50+ protection from harmful UV rays. Flatlock seams help eliminate chafing. The men's Icebreaker Everyday long underwear leggings have a slim fit; functional fly. Machine washable, line dry or dry flat in shade.
short_description: A light first layer for any activity, the men's Icebreaker Everyday long underwear leggings keep you comfortable in cool weather thanks to naturally insulating lightweight merino wool.
